content.detailedDescription: i stepped out on to my front deck minutes before the bbc news was to come on and saw a bright blinking green light to the south, just before 11pm. it was blinking on and off every 2 seconds. naturally i first thought it was a plane since i'm only around 10 miles from the little rock airport.The shade of green was richer than plane lights, then i saw that was the only light-no red or white common to aircraft. as it moved straight west the speed was easily 3 to 4 times faster than aircraft-at that distance airplanes crawl along compared to this thing. the shade of green and speed is what got my attention, but then after traveling approximately 1/5 of the sky (horizon to horizon) it abruptly stopped without appearing to slow first. it then moved straight up an inch or so then stopped again, then moved back east to about where i first noticed it. this time i could detect a faint green glow on the object. it stopped again, then moved straight down and disappeared below the tree line which suggests it was heading south. each time it stopped and changed direction it took maybe one second. holding my bent arm up to the sky it seems to me had the object traveled from horizon to horizon it wouldn't have taken 30 to 40 seconds. needless to say i was a little pumped up seeing my first ufo in the 62 years i've been alive. i watched another 10 minutes or so but it didn't reappear. i came in and logged on to mufon's site but didn't see any reports of this type. had i stepped out earlier i bet you i would have had a longer time to observe it.
content.summary: Flashing green light. moved west, abruptly stopped. shot up, stopped again. moved east back close originial position stopped again. dived down dissapearing behind tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
It was 11pm when i sitting on my couch watching tv when i noticed out of the corner of my eye a wavy clear horizontal apparition. when looking directly at it i immediately said "hello" with no response from it. the apparition was in front of the end table nearest to the front door distorting the things in back of it. i stared at it for about a minute and decided to get up and try to put my hand through it. it immediately dispersed. 

1115pm the beam of negative light was beaming directly through my neighbor's roof. it was the house to the southeast of mine. it was void of any light and i immediately got the sense that my neighbors were being visited by extraterrestrials. i watched carefully listening for anything. there was a strange chirping noise coming from inside the house.I do not know if the beam caused any damage.

1200am after all the excitement i decided to take my dog for a walk around the block when i got up to the main road a person in an old timey trench coat with sunglasses was climbing onto the sidewalk on the other side of the road. my dog doesn't usually bark at people across the road but this person spooked him like i have never seen before. this person initially seemed to walk back and forth until he seemed to try to hide behind a light pole. then he walked over to a brick pillar and hid behind that! i got an extremely strange vibe from that guy. possible man in black.
content.summary: Dark beam of negative energy, vertical wavy distortion

content.detailedDescription: I was at home on my doorstep talking to a neighbour and we were chatting as to why this huge jet was circling our village.The jet started banking to its right at this point the orb appeared at the planes left side close enough to almost touch.It hovered next to the plane for two or three seconds and seemed to brighten then sped off to the west at the same alltitude then seemed to change direction heading towards the ground then dissapeared the plane did another full circle and flew away.I have always wanted to see a ufo and was very excited to have been with another person who saw the same thing i am now a believer.
content.summary: Airforce large four engine jet circled area six times very low on last circle bright orb appeared sat close to plane then flew at speed heading west then desended and dissapeared super high speed plane leaves area.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home checking the sky. 9:30 pm est noticed a white light to the north which was larger and brighter than a star. light became with a circular glow then moved in a close circular motion. that changed into a craft with lights and commenced motion south while climbing in altitude. a triangle with 2 white lights at each corner and 2 red lights blinking near the middle. two white lights at the leading peak of the triangle.

the craft picked up speed as it moved sw over the city of indianapolis. was invisible in 5-6 minutes.
content.summary: Bright white light changed to light with glow to triangle craft with multiple lights

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown

content.detailedDescription:
About 3am? the wind picked up knocking over something metal outside. i happened to get up and check out the sky since two days prior my friend had told me about they saw lights slowly pulsing from red to white in a town i can view from my windows. as i was looking at a colorful star i noticed a small light that got brighter. i focused my attention to it and realize it was not just one small light. 
to the naked eye you could see 5 lights, they were in a horizontal line about 15 degrees up from the horizon. the left light was red, the right light was white, and it looked as though the 3 in the middle faded from red to white perfectly. the white light on the right would become extremely bright then dim, then the middle orangish light would brighten to white then dim. sometimes it happened together, sometimes it was the light 2nd from the right. but the dominate light that was usually bright was furthest right.
i ran upstairs where i keep space binoculars and watches it for almost two hours. i still could see no connection from one light to another, but they were truely in a straight line and stayed that way.. by the second hour i finally noticed how far away it looked that i couldn't even see it with my naked eye anymore. to me it seemed as though ever so slowly it got further away.
in the beginning viewing it normally from red to white light was about an inch of sky, by the end so small it couldn't be measured.
content.summary: The same 5 bright lights...

content.detailedDescription: We took our coffee break about the time of the peak of the eclipse. we go to a particular coffee place on griffiss technology park. when we got there, about 6 people were outside taking pictures of the eclipse. we joined them for a little while then went inside to get coffee. one of the girls who work there, showed what she captured, which ran shivers up my spine. some said maybe drones. i said i’ve never seen drones that look like that. so i had her send me the pictures. i personally didn’t see anything and i didn’t capture anything with my camera. i wish the pictures were much clearer.
content.summary: Photographed objects

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to my house at night,seen a ufo in the south west about 45  degrees, it looked like a whitish /blueish hand shaped cloud in front of the moon,it lasted for about 30 seconds. there was no moon in that position of the sky. to me a ufo entered our atmosphere out of control,left a big s shape whitish smoke trail that was separating into the night.About three times the trail towards the s/w was a hand shaped ufo,it looked like a hand shape in an upright position . it was whitish and bluish in color, it corrected itself and faded into the night ... it lasted for 30 seconds.. it was not a plane helicopter ,drone, blimp, ..
content.summary: Standing out side, the whitish \blueish cloud like look in the night sky,the moon,out of control ufo left a s shaped path , on its side fading in the distant night, at the time confused , after understood what happened,it faded away into the night........

content.detailedDescription: While at work conducting driver training in a parking lot, i noticed a dark object hovering in the sky. the object seemed to be solid but at a distance of approximately one mile i was unable to be sure.  it was obviously large due to it being visible from so far i would guess it was at least the size of a car. since i was at work i couldn't continue to record but the object hovered for about 5 to 7 minutes before slowing losing altitude and going out of sight behind a building obstructing my view. the building in the video is about 250 to 300 yards in front of me. i've spent over 10 years in the military, flown on many aircraft and this object was definitely not an aircraft. fixed wing or rotary.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: While standing in a parking lot object was noticed. birds and aircraft in area clearly not comparable to object. after recording object descended out of view.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside my home smoking a cigarette when a bright light in the sky to the west caught my attention. it was brighter than any star i could see (it's a semi-rural area and not much light pollution). it was changing colors rapidly: red, blue, yellow, green, white, orange. there was no discernible pattern. no other stars in that area of the sky were doing the same. at first i thought it was a plane, but there was a plane flying over at the time and didn't have the same look. i watched it for a couple more minutes to see if it would move as the plane did, and it didn't. wanting another witness, i called to my mother and got her out. she agreed that it didn't look like a plane, saw the same change in colors. as we watched, with naked eyes and binoculars, it seemed to be moving about in different directions very slowly. we could judge this by the trees and power-lines in the foreground. at times we had to walk to the end of our driveway to view it, only to have to return to the house to see it again when it moved in another direction. after about 15 minutes of total viewing time it moved out of sight, still to the west. as an avid sky-watcher, i've seen countless satellites, the iss, meteors, etc pass over and none of them have looked or behaved like this.
content.summary: Bright light to the west, brighter than any visible stars, rapidly changed colors, stayed in one area but appeared to move around slowly and further west from our point of view.

content.detailedDescription: I tested a new sjcam 4000 at night, the video shows the star of vega and a very fast bright object flies gradually becoming brighter and then disappears. proven it is not a satellite.
content.summary: Ufo filmed during a new camera test

content.detailedDescription: I was testing the new camera in ir mode, 8mm full of spectral lenses and ir filter at 1000 nm.
content.summary: Ufo in the ir range of light in the daytime

content.detailedDescription: We where in the back yard when we seen two lights in the air flying next to each other then we seen above us and seen a what looked like a star flying across the sky told my girlfriend to get the camera and it's was to late it all when by so fast.
content.summary: Two fighter jets where flying next to each other chasing the ufo no noise nothing jets couldn't keep up

content.detailedDescription:
On september 26, 2017, at approximately 0830 mst, i was entering the building where i work as a security guard, and i looked up into the sky to the west of my location. i observed what looked like sunlight reflecting off of a plane very high up, probably at least 100,000 feet altitude. it was above the wispy cloud layer. i observed that the  object  that appeared  to be  reflecting was not moving and just hanging in the  sky. 
i notified another guard and he also witnessed the object in the sky. i notified an additional guard, and at least three employees also were notified and observed the object.
i checked my star and planet finder app on my phone and there were no stars or planets in that section of the sky. i attempted to look at the object with binoculars and could see it since it wasn’t moving, but it just appeared to be a white light. 
the object stayed in the same location in the sky for roughly 30 minutes, then when checked periodically appeared to drift very slowly to the north. the object was in the sky in fairly geosynchronous orbit for over an hour. from 0830-0930. i took several photographs of the object with my phone.
i notified another guard at a different facility, approximately 10 miles to the northeast of my facility and asked him if he could see it. he later advised me that he and at least one other guard at his facility did see the object, but not until 1300. this guard advised me that he saw the object to the north  east of my location, and possibly higher since it was harder to see than the photo i’d sent him. this guard advised me that he’d seen the object  for about 30 seconds before it  did a “j loop” and shot off to the southeast. this guard advised me that when the object left it appeared as if a shooting star or a comet, similar to the objects photographed and video-taped over  salt lake city between 09/15/17 and 09/17/17.
i had work to do inside the building so i wasn’t able to observe the object after 0930. when i was next able to check at approximately 1020, i could no longer see the object, apparently because it had moved to the north and east of my location. this means the object remained in the sky over the valley for 4.5 hours.
a little about my background. i was a police officer for 9 years prior to becoming a security guard. i also have a military background. i do consider myself to be a trained observer with a lot of experience. the other guards who witnessed have varying levels of experience, one has military experience, the others are experienced security officers and also trained observers.
content.summary: Daylight sighting of geosynchronous hovering object

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my break from work then notice that something is falling from a cloud cover. i thought it was an airplane but 3 of my workmates also noticed the object being strange. 
the object just burst out from one cloud and the it fell with cloud or smoke from behind it. 
all of us who saw the object believes that this is not an ordinary airplane. the object just stopped emitting smoke or clouds and just vanished.
content.summary: Fell from the clouds then left a trail of cloud spray or smoke. ufo is reflective.

content.detailedDescription: I had noticed there was alot of “chemtrail” activity this day. while looking up at a plane possibly spraying, noticed something shine or sparkle above chemtrail.  waited to see a second and third time to be sure, then decided to document event with cellphone camera. after event ended, looked at pictures and when zoomed in, could see two additional round objects near first seen shiny object. it was obvious this  event took place at high altitude. the plane was flying north to south and object was moving west to east at what seemed to be a slow speed, though i dont know its altitude or size.
content.summary: Watching plane chemtrail, saw object sparkle, took pictures to observe after

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a cigarette on my back porch of my condo. looking down on the pond i see these white circles spinning in a circle on top of the pond across the other side and at the water edge there was a rectangle flashing light they seamed to be cicleing in front off. the red rectangle flashling looked to be on the embankment but 2 feet or so off the ground i could not figure it out or what was going on. nobody looked to be flashing lights from the condos across the way then i thought is it a police or fire truck reflection from parking lot across the pond for the other condos bbut none there. then 3 larger green blue florescent light appear in like a sideway triangle pattern appear the light appears to just come to the surface randomly them a larger blue one appears the same way and then just disappeared in a flash i have no clue in what that was i saw no objects just light
content.summary: On top of pond looking down from condo white circles spinning on top of pond in a cicle then 3 green cicles popped up on top of the pond i n a sideway triangle pattern then a larger bright blue one appeared cl9ser to me in the middle of the pond then just

content.detailedDescription:
This report was filled out and filed at mufon headquarters with witness on the phone by field investigator l. flechtner 18809 on 9/26/17.
--------------------------------------------------------------------

it was a hot and clear night and i went outside and saw a very bright light halfway up the mountain east of me behind some tall trees. the light was too bright to be an vehicle. the light stayed in one place. i went and got my phone and walked to a vacant space to get a better view. i videoed taped the light, my camera phone kept ending the video after so many minutes so i had to keep re videoing it. it seemed at one point to split in half and move as two separate lights several miles apart from each other and then go back together again. hill air force base is less than 1/4 of a mile from me, but the mountain is not on the base. the light seemed very large, larger than a car. i watched it for 2 hours. then i saw two lights come towards me from a playground park area. they seemed to be ground level. they came towards me and then went back where they came from.
i was really tired by now and went inside. i wish i'd stayed outside longer.
i have seen red lights travel over the mountain and come back again on several occasions. 
when i went inside i viewed the video i had taken with a magnifying glass. i found that the light seemed to be emitting rays off of the right side and one was red. i noticed a halo effect and the light also had a little blinking light on the top and on the bottom of the large bright light. 
i don't have a computer so i can't attach the video.
content.summary: I saw an extremely bright light on the side of the mountain northeast of where i live, it seemed to separate and then come together again

content.detailedDescription: I was out hunting wild genseng and stopped for a break ,i was in the the mountains and was a little disoriented and went to check my gps and it wasn't working which was strange because an half hour before it was working fine so i started looking around to see if anything looked familiar and i looked out to the other side of the ridge and a reflection caught my eye,it was perfectly round hovering and silent, it then started coming toward me and stopped, hovered and split into three with the original sphere staying the same size and the other smaller but all three looked to be metallic and perfectly round. after hovering about 5 minutes they took off traveling sw in a triangular formation at an incredible speed,after they were outta site my gps began working again. i't scared me at first but now i feel lucky to have seen what i saw,i now know ufo's are real
content.summary: The round object metallic object hovers split into 3 with the first object staying the same size it then continued traveling sw with incredible speed with the smaller 2 traveling behind in a triangular formation

content.detailedDescription: At 7:03 am september 26 i rolled over in bed to see a glowing orangish/yellow orb near my wifes head it disappeared within 2 seconds as if i starled it i was freaked out for a few minutes, my wife was asleep for the entire event
content.summary: Orange/yellow glow near wifes head

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were watching the sky from the balcony,suddenly we noticed a kind of flying object in the sky .While the distance was lower than an altitude of a plane ,it was illuminated by white lights  and its surface was grey.Its shape was amazingly like a cone that its vertex was much more brighter and it was moving straightly to the southeast and was nearing to the ground.
we both were frightened then i just picked up my phone and took some photes that i have attached them below.
after 15 minutes the light decreased and finally we lost the whole sight.
content.summary: While a cone shaped flying object was so near to the ground it disapeared totally

content.detailedDescription:
J'étais dehors en train de regarder les étoiles.
j'ai vu deux boule lumineuse qui avait une direction sud-ouest nord est.
ces 2 boules lumineuses sont passés au-dessus de moi au moins à 2 ou 3000 mètres d'altitude sans aucun bruit avec une grande vitesse les deux boules ont traversé le ciel en moins de 30 secondes elle se passait devant successivement puis elles ont disparu dans l'horizon.
une dizaine de secondes plus tard 3 ou 4 avions sont passés dans la même direction à une attitude qui était sensiblement la même sur la vidéo qui a été faite avec mon téléphone portable nous ne voyons qu'une seule boule mais il y en avait bien une deuxième juste à côté un petit peu moins lumineuse.
content.summary: 2 boules lumineuses se doublant successivement

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of sept. 23 2017 in southern westchester county, ny near nys thruway, i was sitting on my back porch listening to music. it was around 10pm est. it was such a clear night that, when i looked directly up to the sky, i could see a few stars. i saw this one star that was brighter than the others directly above me that was slightly north of the other four stars next to it.  
approximately five minutes went by and i looked up again.  that is when i saw a green light. it was the size of a dot and only slightly larger than the bright star i was looking at just a few minutes before.  it appeared to be very high in altitude in the night sky. probably thousands of feet up in the air well past the air space of regular air travel.
it was to the left of the bright star that was slightly north of the other stars in the sky and directly over head. this green dot was flashing.  the green color was as vivid in color much like a traffic light. the flash was one flash per second.  
i went inside to call my neighbor in order to get a second witness, but she was not home.  i came back outside thinking the object had gone away, but it was still there.  it then moved to the right slightly blocking the bright star.
the green flashing dot all of a sudden changed to a red flashing dot. same tempo of flashes and red color as vivid as a stop light.  for approximately one minute it flashed red and then slowly drifted east all the while flashing.  it moved east until the tall oak trees in my yard blocked my vision of the object in the sky.
content.summary: Dot size green flash over head high altitude changes to red flash flies off se

content.detailedDescription: Ufo sighting in slc sky
content.summary: White circle hovering at least one hour. very windy say

content.detailedDescription: I was arriving home from work when i noticed multiple orange orbs hovering in the sky. i was excited because i had always wanted to see something like this. i pulled out my cell and took a photo then two videos of the orbs first hovering and then moving at an unknown speed. at first i thought that they might be paper lanterns but i never saw them ascending.
content.summary: Lights, or orbs, hovering then moving in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: A thing came up from a small rift in the sky then it started to enlarge his own radius of light, then after 30 sec it stopped and started cycle right in one position, then it started to shine bright, and then the light just disappear.
